entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who disapproves of the tiara being kept by wizards. He believes it should have been returned to the goblins after the original purchaser died.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a wizard who is letting Harry know that he should be careful about what he promises to the goblins. It seems Bill might know more than he's letting on.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are a group of beings who believe that wizards should return their objects after the original purchaser dies, and not keep them for themselves.

relationships.description: Griphook disapproves of the tiara being kept by wizards, and believes it should have been returned to the goblins.
Bill is cautioning Harry against making promises to the goblins, suggesting that he might know more than he's letting on.
